name: Fistbump'd
description:
Don't get fistbump'd in this frenetic game! Avoid the fists coming from the fist hell, since you're so close to getting punched!

NOTE: if you're playing on a mobile device, hold where you want to be at with your fingers (up, left, down, right)

-----------------------------------------------------------------

Credits:
- Drawings: catmanl
- SFX: catmanl
- Music: catmanl
- Fist image: this site
- Cave background: Minecraft/Mojang

Software:
- Images: Krita/Krita Foundation/KDE && Libresprite/Libre fork of Igara Studio's Aseprite
- SFX: rFXGen/raylib technologies && Bosca Ceoil/Terry Cavanagh
- Music: Bosca Ceoil/Terry Cavanagh
- Game creation tool: raylib/raysan5

-----------------------------------------------------------------

Made for the raylib 5k gamejam The theme was: "that was close!"
